application.name: Desktop MediaViewer
application.description: You are installing the MDID MediaViewer on your computer. The MediaViewer requires a live Internet connection. After you install and run the MediaViewer, you will be prompted to log into your MDID. If successful, you will see a list of your slideshows.

initialWindow.content: [This value will be overwritten by Flash Builder in the output app.xml]
initialWindow.title: MDID Desktop MediaViewer
